automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_lights_dim_after_8pm'
alias: Dim Living Room Lights After 8 PM
description: "When the Living Room light is turned on after 8:00 PM, dim it to about 40% brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.living_room_2
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '20:00:00'
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 40
